name: Bleed
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook. © 2009, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: You cause a living creature that is below 0 hit points but stabilized to resume dying. Upon casting this spell, you target a living creature that has -1 or fewer hit points. That creature begins dying, taking 1 point of damage per round. The creature can be stabilized later normally. This spell causes a creature that is dying to take 1 point of damage.
text_zh: 你致使一名HP低于0点但是已经稳定的生物重新面临死亡。当施放该法术时，你要选择一名HP为-1或更低的活物作为目标。该名生物会开始死亡，每回合受到1点伤害。这名生物能在之后如常稳定伤势。该法术会使濒死的生物受到1点伤害。
